messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE
messages.content: A Conservative government will take bold action on all fronts. We'll cut Gordon Brown's waste and debt to get our economy moving, we'll support families and back people who do the right thing to encourage responsibility in our society and we'll make sure pensioners are supported as well.

And we need big changes in our political system too. We've led the way on cleaning up MPs' expenses and we'll finish the job by scrapping the perks and cutting the cost of Parliament. Most importantly, we'll take power away from the political elite to give you more control over your life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour are now the party of unemployment. Conservatives have a plan to get Britain working again by boosting enterprise, creating growth, and getting the first ten jobs created by new businesses, promote green jobs and help people off welfare and into work.

David Cameron has made the NHS our number one priority. We back it and want to improve it for everyone. The Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year. We are the only party to have made this commitment.

We will create a new generation of schools run by teachers and responsible to parents, not micromanaged by politicians. Parents will also have way with smaller classes, good behaviour, greater teachers and restored confidence in the curriculum.

Families are the foundation of a strong society. Our plans to improve Sure Start with 4,200 extra health visitors, extend flexible working, improve parental leave and open new schools will help make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.

issues.economy: We'll cut Gordon Brown's waste and debt to get our economy moving.
issues.education: We will create a new generation of schools run by teachers and responsible to parents, not micromanaged by politicians.
